wikipedia_page.main: John Marshall Gorham (25 November 1853 - 12 January 1929) was a British motorboat racer who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics.

* John Marshall Gorham, British motorboat racer
In 1906, at the age of 25, she married the 53 year-old John Marshall Gorham, an electrical engineer.
